solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isPerfectSquare(int num) {--newline--            long x = num;--newline--            while (x * x > num) {--newline--                x = (x + num / x) >> 1;--newline--            }--newline--            return x * x == num;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
